name: Global Green Connect
description: Global Green Connect (GGC) is an integrated sustainability network that re-engineers the ecosystem of business. We provide sustainability consulting, market entry advisory, sustainability business accelerator program and ESG training. Its subsidiary GGEF (Global Green Economic Forum) is a purpose driven social enterprise headquartered in Singapore since 2013, it empowers future leaders with innovation, sustainability and leadership through its conference, awards, SDG Open Hack and training programmes. globalgreenconnect.com
